Text:
I've been seeding this for a few days now, but since it's quite a hassle to view or convert it, I will stop seeding it.

If you ever decide to convert it to something that works outside Linux, I'll be happy to seed that. Sorry, just a bit too lazy to boot into Xubuntu for just one movie. If you have recommendations then bring'em on.

http://www.videolan.org/vlc/

works on all operating systems

Is it just me or is that kinda funny?
We got a person (nunchuck) who downloaded a hacker/ing related video and claims that uses a Linux distro, and he can't even download the vlc player to view it in any OS.

idk, it's just hilarious to me...
